name: Authorization Transaction
descriptionHtml:

raw

  "amount": 12.5,
  "currency_code": "USD",
  "reference": "da040abf-314c-41fd-b556-2b1b8a5c9266TEST",
  "stored_payment_instrument": null,
  "payment_instrument": {
    "holder_name": "Marion Mraz TEST",
    "number": "6011208701112222",
    "expiration_date": "2022-04",

    "billing": {

        "city": "Chattanooga",

        "line1": "1234 East Main Street",
        "line2": "Suite 1000"
      }
    }
  }
}
